title: Rapeseed production volume worldwide by country 2018/2019
yAxis: Rapeseed production in million metric tons
summary: In 2018/2019 , European_Union was the leading producer of Rapeseed oranges in the Rapeseed ( EU28 ) , with over 3.7 million of Rapeseed oranges produced .
The Spanish volume was more than two times the volume of Canada , the second largest producer of oranges .
The other three producers in the EU produced less than one million during this year .
gold: This statistic provides a forecast of the rapeseed production volume worldwide in 2018/2019 , by country . It was forecasted , that the rapeseed production of Canada would amount to some 21.1 million metric tons . The global production of rapeseed oil is expected to reach nearly 28 million metric tons by that year .
